name: Ghosts of the Past
description:
A small game made at Enjam GameJam 2018 at SDU Denmark by 3 people. The theme for the jam was "Time" and we choose to do some "Time travel" where your past self is preserved and used to solve the puzzles. The "tutorial" doesn't explain all the aspects so here is a short guide:

- At the start of a level you chose where to spawn

- in levels with time travel a timer will appear at the top. When the time is up, time will be turned back to the beginning, with your actions saved as a ghost.

- You can interact with your ghosts: Stand on them, move them, and help them jump higher.

- You can manually turn back time with by pressing "R".

- If a ghost see you it will create a hole in the space time continuum and you will lose

- When time is turned back you can choose to shoot a ghost, only a limited number of bullets is available.

- You can choose what way a player spawns by pressing "A" or "D".

Have fun!
